Class Constants.UITheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.client.Constants.UITheme
  • Enclosing class:
    Constants

    public static class Constants.UITheme
extends Object
    Class for parsing and storing UI themes.
    Author:
    A. Behne
